scripts.build: npm run pretalx && npm run link:dev && cross-env BUILD_ENV=development gulp
scripts.build:prod: npm run pretalx && npm run link:prod && cross-env BUILD_ENV=production gulp
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cross-env BUILD_ENV=development gulp deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && cross-env BUILD_ENV=production gulp deploy
scripts.firestore:func:dev: npm run link:dev && firebase deploy -P dev --only functions
scripts.firestore:func:prod: npm run link:prod && firebase deploy -P prod --only functions
scripts.firestore:init: firebase firestore:delete -r --all-collections && firebase functions:config:set schedule.enabled=true && firebase deploy --except hosting && babel-node ./internals/import-default-data
scripts.firestore:init:dev: npm run link:dev && cross-env BUILD_ENV=development && npm run firestore:cacheUserSchedules:dev && npm run firestore:init && npm run firestore:restoreCachedUserSchedules:dev
scripts.firestore:init:prod: npm run link:prod && cross-env BUILD_ENV=production && npm run firestore:cacheUserSchedules:prod && npm run firestore:init && npm run firestore:restoreCachedUserSchedules:prod
scripts.firestore:copy:dev: npm run link:dev && cross-env BUILD_ENV=development npm run firestore:copy
scripts.firestore:copy:prod: npm run link:prod && cross-env BUILD_ENV=production npm run firestore:copy
scripts.serve: npm run link:dev && cross-env BUILD_ENV=development gulp serve
scripts.serve:prod: npm run link:prod && cross-env BUILD_ENV=production gulp serve
